hero.title: Building the Future of Tech with AI, Automation, and Scalable Solutions
hero.description: Passionate Full Stack Developer specializing in performance, SEO, scalable architecture, and AI-driven solutions. I build high-performing, intelligent, and user-friendly digital experiences across web, mobile, and beyond.

projects.title: Projects
projects.dataremediationDescription: Advanced data cleansing and transformation solutions that ensure data quality and compliance across enterprise systems.
projects.infrastructureportalDescription: Centralized platform for managing cloud infrastructure, automating deployments, and monitoring system performance.
projects.informationproviderDescription: Real-time data aggregation and distribution systems that deliver critical business intelligence to stakeholders.

plan.title: Plan - Strategy & Architecture
plan.description: We start by understanding your business needs and goals. I create a clear roadmap, selecting the right technologies to ensure scalability, performance, and maintainability.

build.title: Build – Full-Stack Development
build.description: From frontend UI to backend APIs, I develop fast, secure, and user-friendly applications tailored to your project's vision. Clean code, best practices, and seamless integrations are my priority

scale.title: Scale – Optimization & Growth
scale.description: Once launched, I ensure your app runs at peak performance. Speed, SEO, and security enhancements help you reach more users while keeping your platform efficient and future-proof

about.title: About Me
about.specializeIn: I specialize in building responsive, high-performance web applications with modern frameworks and best practices for accessibility and SEO.

description: Developed and maintained a web application for infrastructure automation, streamlining DevOps workflows.
Designed and built the backend, ensuring seamless integration with infrastructure services.
Transitioned from DevOps to Frontend Engineering, leveraging both backend and infrastructure knowledge for full-stack development.
Optimized system performance and enhanced automation processes for better scalability.
Worked with modern frontend frameworks to create dynamic and responsive applications.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement new features and improve existing systems.
Developed and implemented recovery strategies, ensuring minimal downtime and data integrity.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.intro: Got an awesome idea? A cool project? Or just want to chat? I’m all ears, hit me up through any of these channels!
